name: Fae.dev - Design to clean React code (beta)
description:
Fae.dev Figma connector.

  1. Take high quality Figma designs using auto-layout and text/color styles.
  2. Combine multiple components into one React component
  3. Export readable React code


Supported exports:

  • React + Styled Components
  • React + SCSS
  • React + CSS Modules
  • React + CSS (standard classes)
  • React + Inline styles



More info: www.fae.dev
